document.bingtitle: COOKING GAMES RESTAURANT GAMES - Enjoy Cooking Games
document.webtitle: COOKING GAMES RESTAURANT GAMES - Enjoy Cooking Games
document.description: ... is having a lot of clients in his fast food restaurant and ... Enjoy cooking sandwiches, fruit cups ... Seat the customers to the tables take the orders and bring them the food.
document.body:
Searches: cook cupcake and candy cook amandines cake bartender cook waiter games shrimp gumbo compote of dried fruit valentine games chocolate rum pots colorful juices Home Baking Games Burger Games Cake Games Cooking Games Decoration Games Pizza Games Restaurant Games Serving Games Tag games: restaurant games Bar B Que
The customers will arrive and he will make the order, it's important to make the food in the correct order, from the left to the right. Try to finish the order before time runs out. Good luck! Barbis Bakery
This game is about you making money and about the customers who will give you the money if you will serve them the requested food and in time. Identify the customers requested food and then pack it in a box. If you fail to satisfy one client you will lose a life. Good luck! Beach Restaurant
You will fin the food that the customers like and help the robot to serve the food correctly. Select the food and then select the table where you want to serve the food. Good luck! Boat House Hotel
You have your hotel on a boat and you have to manage it well to win this game. Serve your best clients and the regular one the same and make them feel satisfied all the time. Good luck! Breakfast Bar
Prepare the food as your customers ordered and serve them as fast as possible. Be careful to make the food right so you no lose money and points. You can try the recipes from this game at your kitchen at home too. Enjoy the game and enjoy cooking! Burger Restaurant
The Customers will come to your burger restaurant and make their orders, you will have to make the customers burger and serve them. Good luck and make as much money as you can so your restaurant business prosper.Use your money to purchase upgrades! Burger Restaurant 3
Give to your customers the best burgers and you will make the biggest score on this game and this burger restaurant will be the best from all over the world. Have fun and good luck! Burger Restaurant 4
You are the god of burgers now and you own the best burger restaurant from town. Take care of the restaurant clients and give them the best food and burgers. Enjoy! Busy Bee Restaurant
Mr. Bee need a new cooking chef for his restaurant Busy Bee and that cook will be you. Your job is to match the food and drink ingredients as fast as possible and make sure the food and drinks could be served on time. Good luck and be a good chef! Cake Shop
The customers are coming to the shop and order a cake, you will make the cake and serve your client, and take the tips. Enjoy! Cake Shop
Play the role of an owner of a cake shop and make money doing cakes for your customers. Enjoy and good luck in business! Cake Shop 2
In your cake shop the customers will come and make the order for the cake he want. Your job is to select the right ingredients, make the cake and serve it to the customers. Try to be the best and win this serving game. Coffee Shop
Identify the desired coffee that your customers like after this prepare and serve the required coffee before the customers waiting time exceeds. Good luck! Coffee Time
Coffee Time is a place were anyone can eat and drink anything, now you are in charge of this place, the customers are coming take the orders and serve them. Good luck and be fast! Colorful Juice
This is a cool game where you will serve juices made by you to the clients who are some lovely kids. Be careful to the color! Cooking Academy 2
You are a waitress in this game and you will serve your customers with the best food made by you and to prepare the best food for them. Select the ingredients and mix them from an ever-producing food machine. Enjoy this game! Cutis Diner
Play in this game the role of a beautiful waitress call Betty and serve the customers, make money and do your job the best you can. Take the food from the restaurant kitchen and give it to your clients. Good luck! Dabbawalla International
Mumbai Dabbawallas are going international, because of their management efficiency. They have been invited to provide their services to 4 cities around the globe. to keep their reputation, it's your job to match right orders. Have fun! Dinner Chef
Your business is opened and the customers are coming to your shop your task is to pleased them and serve them in time. Good luck! Dinner Dash
Keep your customers happy by serving them as fast as you can. If the customers are happy you will win more points. When the customers are leaving clean the table. Good luck! Fairy Cooking Game
Make cakes and sell them to your clients who are in love with your delicious and beautiful work that you are doing, be careful to the time. Good luck and have fun making the best cakes ever! Fairyland Juice Center
Play the role of a cute fairy named Cloudie, who have to run a Fairyland juice center. Your task is to attend all the customers and complete all levels, the complexity of the game will be bigger as you pass to next level. Good luck! Falafel King
Prepare the servings for the customers and serve them well. Make sure all the servings(pita) contains all the ingredients so the customers to be satisfy. If you will play well you will perhaps win the title of Falafel King! Family Banquet
A family banquet will have place soon in your family and you will have to serve your family members the best you can and with the most delicious food made by you. Have fun and good luck! Family Restaurant
Family restaurant is getting very bad now, and you have to make it run again and serve your customers how you can so the family business to run again. Take orders from your clients and respect their food request exactly. Good luck! Fast Food
Your job in this game is to transform this Fast Food restaurant into the most popular restaurant in town! Be a good a good looking waitress's and make a yummy food. Good luck! Fastfood Rapidly
Mary is having a lot of clients in his fast food restaurant and you will have to help her to do his job. Give your clients a fast food rapidly. Good luck! Fishy Feast
Feast yourself with this delicious fishy feast. To prepare this fish recipe you will use different kinds of fish, sauce garnish's, shrimp, octopus, lobster and yummy fresh vegetables. Enjoy this game! Food Mania
Customers satisfaction is your main goal, and you will serve the food to make them happy. Collect the money from the customers and pass to the next level. Enjoy and good luck! Forest Cooking
Your main task today is to cook the best food in the forest and a sweet squirrel will helping you. Enjoy! Forest Restaurant
Your friends will come to your restaurant from the forest and you will have to serve them with the best food made by you. Enjoy cooking sandwiches, fruit cups, eggs, brownies and more and serve them to your forest friends! Grep Cooks
Dhaba restaurant its yours and your job is to serve as many customers as possible from 9PM until midnight. If you manage to keep Dhaba open until the end of the day without lose more than 5 clients then you can open next day the restaurant . Make a lot of money! Instant Noodles
Ruby is in charge with his father restaurant which is out of city on a business tour. Your task is to help Ruby in her father's business by running a successful restaurant . Serve all the clients as best as you can. Unlock many items after each level. Serve right orders and keep your customers happy! Good luck! Janes Hotel Family Hero
Make your customers feel good to win points so you can upgrade your hotel and it becomes the best! Have fun and good luck! Japanese Buffet
Make a great Japanese buffet for your customers, take care of them and give them the food they ask for. Serve your customers on time so they will leave happy and you to make a high score! Enjoy! Jennifer Rose Restaurant Love
This game is about a love restaurant run by Jennifer Rose and because his customers are coming so fast she needs your help. Put the customers to the table, take orders, bring food, remove dirty dishes to the trash bin.Don't forget to give some attention to Jennifer boyfriend. Enjoy! Lea Fast Food Restaurant
Play the role of a new waitress in this nice restaurant where you will do a hard work here because the clients are coming very fast. Your customers want to get their orders really quickly and for you to win this game you need to reach the target each day. Good luck! Lee Restaurant
You are a waitress and your goal is to become a five star waitress after this game is finish. You have five days to do your best and to try and make your customers happy. Seat the customers to the tables take the orders and bring them the food. Collect the money be fast and good luck! Lilou Italian Restaurant
Now you will manage an Italian restaurant , you will be a waitress to an your job will be to set the customers to the tables, take the orders and serve the best food to your customers. Be the best and your business will work well. Enjoy! Madrasidhaba
Madrasi Dhaba is yours now and you will have to serve as many customers, first day you will keep the restaurant opened until 9PM. If you will lose more then 5 customers then you can't open the Madrasi Dhaba tomorow morning. Good luck! McDonalds
To make money is not so simple. Behind every sandwich is a complex process and you must learn how to manage this, by playing this game. McHamburg
Play this game if you want to became a burger master and you will cook the most delicious burgers in no time by playing the Mchamburg management game! Enjoy and good luck! Mcrowells Cafeteria
You are working to Mcrowells Cafeteria as a waitress and your job is to serve your clients and win as much money you can until the day is over. Good luck! Mixed Fruit Juice
You are here now and you will make a mixed fruit juice, which is very refreshing. Lets start the work! Mommas Diner
Play the role of a waitress at Mommas Dinner restaurant and your job is to make the customers happy. Seat customers to the tables, take the orders and serve your customers . Good luck! Mr Meaty
Customers will come to your shop and their orders will appears on the order screen. Some of the clients might request one or more ingredient less than the regular recipe. Time for 2 clients is 3 min. Good luck! Omelet Restaurant
This is a cool restaurant game where you will seat your customers at empty tables and take their orders. Wait until the food is done, then put it on a plate. Add the appropriate topping, then serve up the omelet! Good luck cooking and serving the customers! Pancake House
Pancake house is a famous restaurant where the clients are coming fast and you have to serve them with the best food in town. Good luck! Pancake Serving
This game is about serving your customers with the food they demand and its about making the best pancakes. Good luck! Pappaz Pizza Game
Your job is to try to keep your Pappas restaurant keep going for as long as you can and don't miss your orders. Good luck! Penguin Dinner
Customers are waiting you are a penguin waitress and you will seat the customers to the tables and after that serve them with the requested food. Good luck and dont get angry. Penguin Dinner 2
After Penguin come home from Antarctica decides to open up her own restaurant . Your task is to help Penny to play through 4 exciting locations, serving customers and earning prized-stars for Penny's Diner restaurant . Be the best, and make the restaurant be the best too! Pet Feeding
Are you a pet lover? In this game your job is to give food to the pets and make them happy. Have fun with your pets. Pet Restaurant
You are working now in a pet restaurant and your clients will be a lots of pets. Your job is to make them happy and serve them with the best food and before time exceeds. Good luck! Popcorn Booth Management
You will be a popcorn master, you will make popcorn and after this serve your customers. Enjoy! Restaurant
You will be the new employee of a great restaurant that just opened in your city, and you have to have a good memory of the orders from the customers and to do your job with passion. Enjoy! Restaurant Business
Your customers are not patience, and don't take to long to prepare orders from your customers because these means bad business. Serve to customers foods and earn money! Enjoy and good luck cooking and serving! Restaurant Design
Your object in this game is to make and decorate your club restaurant in your own way. To complete this task chose from the left menu everything you think it will help you. Good luck! Restaurant Gorenge
A new restaurant named Gorenge has been opened in town and the owner is looking for a new waitress employee. Can you do this job? Good luck! Restless Restaurant
This game have 3 levels to complete the first level you have to earn 400 points, the second level 500 points and the third level 600 points. Serve your customers the best you can, with the food they order and in time to complete each level and make your restaurant business work. Good luck! Roadside Fastfood
You are working to a fast food and your job is to identify the food preferred by the customers and give it to them. If you serve wrongly your score will go down. Enjoy! Rosie Restaurant
Give Rosie some help and get rich in the restaurant business! Sami Tea Restaurant
The kids will come to Sami Tea restaurant and they will order some tea or something else and you will be a sweet waitress who will serve them. Try to serve the customers in time or they will leave crying. Good luck! School Cafeteria
The students are coming to have a juice or a coffee ti the school cafeteria, and you are the bartender now. Self Service
To win this game your customers must be on the first place for you.Prepare sandwiches, make coffee and fruit shakes for the customers and be careful not to overcook the bread and the eggs. If you want to make shakes, drag the fruits into the blender. Be the best! Server Bee
Server Bee is a famous restaurant and you will manage the restaurant and serve the customers like a good bee. Have fun flying! Spring Rolls Game
Now you will help the chef from an famous Japanese restaurant to make the best springs rolls, sushi and many other Japanese food, but you must respect the given time so that your customers to not wait very long or they will leave angry. Good luck! Sunny Terrace
Seat the customers that come to your place to the tables and take the orders. Deliver food, drinks according with what they order. Finally collect the money and clean the tables. Good luck! Supper Stacker
To win this game you have to catch as many burgers, hot dogs, coffee on your plate. Good luck! Sushi Chef
You are the new sushi chef in a restaurant and you have one week to make this restaurant work well. Good luck making money and make the restaurant be the most famous in your city! Sushi No Suki
See the customer order and look in to the recipes book and after this make the food for him. You have targets at every level. To win tips, make your customer happy. Good luck! Suzis Big City Diner
In this game you will help Suzie to have a good time her and his clients to smile and have a great meals at this fast paced, fun, drive in diner! The Observant
Observe the customers requested food and take care of their orders. If you serve the wrong foodstuff you will lose a life, be careful. Good luck! Tokyo Penguin Diner
This is a new penguin diner game. Do you remember that last time we met in New York? Today we came across the whole world straight to Japan to open a brand new restaurant made in the traditional Japanese style. This means a lot of fun to be honest with you. Serve every penguin who comes into your restaurant with only the finest foods possible. Move quick and challenge your friends to play with you to see who's quicker. Total Exhaustion
Mr. Baker is very tired today and he need some help from you to serve the customers. Can you do it? Good luck! Underwater Restaurant
You will manage an underwater restaurant . Find the food desired by your customers and serve them, before the customer's waiting time exceeds. Good luck! Valentines Shop
In this game you will play the role of beautiful Valentine and you own a chocolate-shop, your job is to use chocolate machine and select the right flavor for your customers. Buy upgrades with your tips! Good luck!
(77 results found) Check out these other great sites:
Cooking Games Submit your game Free Cooking Games for Webmasters Contact Us Partners: Smiley Dressup
